headline: Pega Named a Leader in Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ and Recognized in Critical Capabilities Report for Business Orchestration and Automation Technology
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., October 24, 2025--Pegasystems Inc. (NASDAQ: PEGA), The Enterprise Transformation CompanyTM, today announced that Gartner has named Pega a Leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Business Orchestration and Automation Technology (1) and was recognized in the accompanying Critical Capabilities report (2). Pega was named a Leader in the Magic Quadrant for its Completeness of Vision and Ability to Execute and received the highest scores for two Critical Capabilities use cases: Case M

headline: Pure Storage Named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Infrastructure Platform Consumption Services
summary: Pure Storage (NYSE: PSTG), the IT pioneer that delivers the world's most advanced data storage technology and services, today announced it has been named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Infrastructure Platform Consumption Services.

headline: Shareholder Value Creation In An Expanded Addressable Market
summary: Aristotle Boston reviews Q3 2025 performance, highlighting strategic buys and long-term value drivers. Explore how portfolio shifts aim to boost shareholder returns.

headline: Is Generative AI Forcing Gartner (IT) to Rethink Its Research Subscription Model?
summary: In recent days, Barclays downgraded Gartner from Overweight to Equal-Weight due to concerns about weakening contract growth, downward revisions in earnings and revenue estimates, and the potential disruption of its research model by generative AI tools. Hedge fund holdings in Gartner have also declined, and investor confidence appears to be waning as challenges related to AI commoditization and profit expectations come into sharper focus. Rising scrutiny on Gartner’s business model...
